Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters used for various graphical settings.

HitBulletDecalOffset_HitIns.AltName: Decal Generation Position Offset on Bullet Hit
HitBulletDecalOffset_HitIns.Wiki: The offset to apply to the position of a generated decal that occurs upon a bullet hit (by this value in its normal direction).

TorchEmissiveIntensity.Wiki: The maximum emissive strength of the torch light. This value is obtained by multiplying the specified frame.

TorchEmissiveFadeFrame.Wiki: The fade time when the torch's emissive strength is changed. 60 frames equals 1 second.

CharaWetDecalFadeRange.AltName: Decal Fade Distance after Character is Wet
CharaWetDecalFadeRange.Wiki: The distance at which a decal is faded after a character is made wet.

BulletMultiFrameHitSfxIntervalTimeSec.Wiki: The interval between each hit SFX if a bullet its in multiple stages. In seconds.

PaintDecalFadeOutTimeSec.Wiki: The fade out duration for decals after they have been painted.

GrassLod_0_0.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 0.

GrassLod_0_1.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 1.

GrassLod_0_2.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 1 to 2.

GrassLod_0_3.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 2 to 3.

GrassLod_1_0.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 0.

GrassLod_1_1.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 1.

GrassLod_1_2.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 1 to 2.

GrassLod_1_3.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 2 to 3.

GrassLod_2_0.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 0.

GrassLod_2_1.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 0 to 1.

GrassLod_2_2.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 1 to 2.

GrassLod_2_3.Wiki: The grass generator LOD settings from level 2 to 3.

SubWindow_Width.Wiki: The width of the sub-window. In pixels.

SubWindow_Height.Wiki: The height of the sub-window. In pixels.

MenuBackBoke_FadeInTime.Wiki: The fade in duration for the menu background blur. In seconds.

MenuBackBoke_FadeOutTime.Wiki: The fade out duration for the menu background blur. In seconds.

ZoomBlur_ThresholdSpeedKmH.Wiki: The threshold speed at which zoom blur occurs during boost movement. In kilometres per hour.

ZoomBlur_InterpolationTime.Wiki: The time until the zoom blur reaches its maximum value.

ZoomBlur_Pow.Wiki: The strength of the zoom blur.

ZoomBlur_CenterOffset.Wiki: The centre offset to apply to the zoom blur. Used to avoid blurring around the character.

ZoomBlur_Contrast.Wiki: The contrast value to apply to the zoom blur.

ZoomBlur_UVOffsetUp.AltName: Zoom Blur: UV Value (Top of Screen)
ZoomBlur_UVOffsetUp.Wiki: The UV value to apply during zoom blur at the top of the screen.

ZoomBlur_UVOffsetDown.AltName: Zoom Blur: UV Value (Bottom of Screen)
ZoomBlur_UVOffsetDown.Wiki: The UV value to apply during zoom blur at the bottom of the screen.

HitInsDamageNearSfxNumMax.Wiki: The maximum number of particles that can be generated by hit SFX. In metres.

HitInsDamageNearSfxDist.Wiki: The maximum distance at which hit SFX will occur. In metres.

ShadowFixedFov.Wiki: The fixed angle of view to use for shadow rendering: used to resolve an issue where the shadow sometimes stretches like a line when the player moves repeatedly.
